comments:
Build id: 200405190010

While a checkout was in progress, I opened (and created) the Java perspective.  
Some progress dialogs, etc. came up as expected urging me to slow down...

When the checkout completed, my package explorer was empty other than the text 
"An error has occurred when creating this view"  I found the following in my log

external model manager is never null.
